about_the_game:
Small scaled "Mini" Fantasy RPG where you create your own character, remember forgotten spells, find new mystical items, and have the chance to experience multiple paths and endings in the game. All New Origins is intended to be a short played game that can be completed in a few hours in a playthrough however offers much replay-ability, with a new character to make, new items and spells to pick, and different paths and secrets to find. Feel like playing an RPG but don't want the huge time sink and complexity of the great ones? Check out this small project!

STORY:
Your hero awakens in a dungeon with no idea what happened to them. The only thing left is a note from your nemesis telling you how they stole your memory and if you want it back you have to go and find them thus starting an all new origin for this hero.

Feel like playing an RPG but don't want the huge time sink and complexity of the great ones? Check out this small project!

name: All New Origins

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - 750 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - 750 or equivalent
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
